sentences.english: All of this work is still highly classified.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些工作仍是高度机密。

sentences.english: Evena railway map is close to classified information.
sentences.chinese: 即使是一张铁路图也近似于机密消息。

sentences.english: Young scene seize turned separate yeongjo, want to notice him about plucking exceedingly senti-mental secrets.
sentences.chinese: 幼景抓住转身分开的英祖，要通知他关于寒星的机密。

sentences.english: AnShan tiger surveillance to meet with dao Yin CuiGuoHuan confidential and report to RenHui.
sentences.chinese: 安善虎监视到道贤跟崔国焕机密见面，汇报给仁惠。

sentences.english: Growing restriction of the range of public information under the pressure of military secrecy.
sentences.chinese: 以保守军事机密为由对公众信息越来越多的限制。

sentences.english: Cryptogram programming of confidential information is an effective tool for ensuring information security.
sentences.chinese: 机密信息的密码化是保证信息安全的一种有效手段。

sentences.english: The statesman is ostracize because he betray many top secrets.
sentences.chinese: 那个政治家因泄漏许多国家最高机密而被放逐。

sentences.english: Sam:How long am i gonna be on double-secret probation?
sentences.chinese: 我还要接受你这种双重机密对待多久？

sentences.english: Are you inadvertently sharing confidential data with third parties?
sentences.chinese: 是否会不小心与第三方共享机密数据？

sentences.english: Firstly, it had created a secure system for uploading classified documents.
sentences.chinese: 首先，它为机密文件创造了一个安全系统。

sentences.english: Store confidential information in encrypted form.

sentences.english: Built in 1938, the top-secret bunker was codenamed Paddock.
sentences.chinese: 建于1938年的最高机密地下堡垒代号“围场”。

sentences.english: There might be more after that, including an immense bundle of confidential diplomatic cables.
sentences.chinese: 陆续可能还有大量货色，包括成堆的机密外交电报。

sentences.english: It is a top secret, government detention center.
sentences.chinese: 这是一座高度机密的政府拘留中心。

sentences.english: It has achieved the biggest disclosure of classified information in modern history.
sentences.chinese: 它已经成功的公布了近代史上的最大量的机密信息。
